Information: Represents the fraction of all domestic solid waste represented by this type
Represents the fraction of all industrial solid waste represented by this type
Fraction of waste in category ``CAT-WASTE-SOLID`` that is recycled. This value should be :math:`\in [0, 1]`. Recycling of food and yard waste categories is assumed to be sent to compost.
Methane Generation Rate :math:`k`, a physical parameter characterizing each type of waste that is landfilled.

Variable: Virgin Production Energy Demand Reduction Factor
Information: Represents the reduction in demand for virgin production of raw materials that comes from increased recycling. Related to production of that material in the economy.
